About Monterey Bay Door

Family-owned commercial access control specialists with 30+ years of construction and security expertise, serving Central California since 2007

Get In Touch See Our Work

Our Story

Built on expertise, driven by service

30+ Years of Construction Experience

Before founding Monterey Bay Door in 2007, our team spent decades in commercial construction, working on major projects throughout Central California. This construction background gives us unique insight into project timelines, building requirements, and the real-world challenges of commercial door hardware installation.

Local Expertise, Professional Standards

As a family-owned business based in Hollister, we understand the Central California market. We know the building codes, the local contractors, and the unique challenges of coastal construction. But we maintain the same professional standards and vendor relationships as the largest national distributors.

Direct Vendor Partnerships

Through our direct relationships with Allegion and other major manufacturers, we offer competitive pricing typically reserved for large national distributors. This means better prices for you and direct access to technical support when you need it.

Our Values

What drives everything we do

Professional Standards

Every installation meets manufacturer specifications and local codes. We're licensed, bonded, and insured because your project deserves protection.

Transparent Pricing

No hidden markups or surprise fees. Our direct vendor relationships mean competitive pricing with full transparency on every quote.

Local Accountability

We live and work in this community. When you call, you get local service from people who care about their reputation in Central California.

Long-term Partnerships

Installation is just the beginning. We provide ongoing service, maintenance, and support to keep your systems running for years to come.

Serving Central California

From the Monterey Bay to the Central Coast, we understand the unique requirements of coastal construction and the importance of reliable security systems.
